amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to helping homeowners and small businesses mitigate against flood loss.

vote.text: Amendment SA 619 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 619 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Menendez.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 619 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
